title: HORACE TAKES OVER a.k.a. One Thrilling Night.

sources.title: HORACE TAKES OVER a.k.a. One Thrilling Night.
sources.description: This 790 MB file has the same video and audio qualities as the 3.8 GB file found elsewhere at IA. A screwball comedy of errors in which newlyweds' first night is constantly interrupted by a wandering corpse, dumb crooks and frustrated cops. It received the best press reviews of any Monogram release. Stars John Beal and Wanda McKay, supported by Warren Hymer, J Farrel MacDonald and Tom Neal. Directed by William Baudine Released in 1942 Complete print IMDB page: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0035152/?ref_=fn_tt_tt_1
